title: GAMEBREAKING BUG!!
body: See pic! Can't believe this has been going on for so long unnoticed!!

replies.body: Fuck it. I'm downvoting myself too. Y'all nerds.
umm, how is that a game breaking bug?

> [{quoted}](name=mobius1galm16,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=9mBRYKlG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2014-12-15T03:25:26.067+0000)
> umm, how is that a game breaking bug?

It is a joke? But apparently the white knights here have zero sense of humor.
